name: THE MYSTERY FOREST
description:
THIS GAME IS A 2D PLATTFORMER.

FIGHT AS A DEER CREATURE AGAINST OPPONENTS WHO STANDS  IN YOUR WAY.

TO FIND YOUR BELOVED LITTLE SISTER AGAIN.

WHO IS LOST IN THE DEEP MYSTERIOUS FOREST AND BRING HER BACK HOME. 

CONTROLS:

A / D OR ARROW BUTTONS - MOVE

SPACEBAR- JUMP

G - SWORD ATTACK

LICENSES:

FONTS - OPEN SANS CONDENSED

SOUNDS -  EPIDEMIC SOUNDS

THIS PROJECT WAS CREATED IN THE FIRST SEMESTER OF HTK.
